effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, this ball has a catch rate of 5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 0.1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
